name: Brand Tagger - Burger Index
description: A solution to identify store brands from data collected on platforms like Uber Eats, Grab, Gojek, Zomato, Hunger-Station, and Jahez. Implements a text and image-embedding-based pipeline to differentiate brands with similar names but different logos, creating a searchable brand index for keyword extraction and tagging.
role: Developed a pipeline to generate image embeddings for logos and cover images extracted from multiple platforms
Built a central index combining text and image variations, with processes to expand and accommodate newly identified brands
Designed a comparison pipeline to tag existing data based on available modalities (text and image)
Integrated the brand index with Elasticsearch Cloud to enable efficient search and keyword-based retrieval
